snippet: Seamus Daly, a well-known Irish Republican, was charged on Thursday with the murders of 29 people in a car bombing in Omagh, Northern Ireland, in 1998.
abstract: Well-known Irish Republican Seamus Daly is arrested and charged with the murders of 29 people who were killed in car bombing in Omagh, Northern Ireland, in 1998.
lead_paragraph: Seamus Daly, a well-known Irish Republican, was charged on Thursday with the murders of 29 people in a car bombing in Omagh, Northern Ireland, in 1998.

headline.main: Northern Ireland: Man Charged in 1998 Bombing
headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland: Man Charged in 1998 Bombing
